thread.section_title: Texas Tech Red Raiders News - Sports News for Dallas, Texas
thread.title: Week 7 Recruit Report: Tech commits with big week, QB pledges to Oregon, Ohio State, Houston and Oklahoma State shine
thread.title_full: Week 7 Recruit Report: Texas Tech commits with big week, QB pledges to Oregon, Ohio State, Houston and Oklahoma State shine | Dallas Morning News

author: Avi Zaleon
title: Week 7 Recruit Report: Tech commits with big week, QB pledges to Oregon, Ohio State, Houston and Oklahoma State shine
text:
Welcome to the weekly SportsDayHS Recruit Report in which we look at how the area's best recruits performed during the past week's high school games.
Please note that not every recruit is listed, including defensive players and linemen, since we do not have stats for them. Also note that players committed to colleges in the DMN coverage area (Texas, Texas A&M, Oklahoma, Baylor, TCU, SMU and North Texas) are listed below recruits who are either uncommitted or committed to out-of-area programs.
Class of 2016
(STANFORD) Flower Mound Marcus TE Kaden Smith: 5 catches, 86 yards
Sachse WR Devin Duvernay: BYE
(OHIO STATE) DeSoto QB Tristen Wallace: 18-of-37, 260 yards, 2 TDs, INT; 16 carries, 82 yards
(OREGON) Allen QB Seth Green: 21-of-30, 309 yards, 5 touchdowns, INT; 10 carries, 113 yards
Lancaster ATH Tyrell Alexander: 6 carries, 76 yards; 1 catch, 10 yards
(STANFORD) Plano RB Brandon Stephens: 23 carries, 63 yards, TD
Plano East WR Audie Omotosho: 2 catches, 22 yards
Southlake Carroll RB Lil' Jordan Humphrey: 18 carries, 121 yards, TD, 2 catches, 31 yards, 2 TDs
(CLEMSON) Argyle TE J.C. Chalk: 2 catches, 72 yards, TD
(HOUSTON) Lovejoy QB Bowman Sells: 24-38, 266 yards, 2 TDs; 26 carries, 110 yards, 2 TDs
(OKLAHOMA STATE) Argyle Liberty Christian QB Nick Starkel: 22-33, 403 yards, 2 TDs, 2 INTs
(ARKANSAS) Arlington Lamar WR Kofi Boateng: 3 catches, 82 yards
Frisco Heritage WR Bubba Ogbebor: 9 catches, 146 yards, 3 TDs; 1 rush, 11 yards
(OKLAHOMA STATE) DeSoto RB La'Darren "LD" Brown: 10 carries, 49 yards, TD; 1 catch, 17 yards
(WASHINGTON) Lovejoy WR Aaron Fuller: 8 catches, 52 yards
(KANSAS) Mansfield Timberview WR Braylon Royal: 1 catch, 27 yards
Southlake Carroll WR Zach Farrar: 3 catches, 52 yards, 2 TDs
(SDSU) Plano East WR Tim Wilson: 1 catches, 8 yards
West Mesquite TE Donte Coleman: 1 catch, 12 yards
Class of 2017
Wylie East RB Eno Benjamin: 36 carries, 257 yards, 2 TDs, 1-for-1 passing, 14 yards, TD
DeSoto WR KD Nixon: 8 catches, 135 yards, 2 TDs
Cedar Hill WR Camron Buckley: 6 catches, 68 yards, TD
Denton Guyer TE Brian Polendey: 2 catches, 44 yards, TD
Lancaster WR Omar Manning: 3 catches, 72 yards, TD
Cedar Hill QB Avery Davis: 16-of-23, 237 yards, 3 TDs, 2 INTs; 11 carries, 71 yards, TD
Rockwall WR Sam Crawford: OFF
South Oak Cliff ATH Markiese King: N/A
Waxahachie WR Jalen Reagor: 7 catches, 93 yards, TD
Mansfield RB Kennedy Brooks: 32 rushes, 284 yards, 2 TDs
Frisco Lone Star QB Jason Shelley: 15-of-19, 184 yards, 2 TDs; 15 rushes, 68 yards
Parish Episcopal RB Dominic Williams: 9 rushes, 150 yards, 2 TDs
Texas Tech Skyline RB Da'Leon Ward: 22 carries, 170 yards, 2 TDs
Mansfield Lake Ridge QB Jett Duffey: 8-15, 125 yards, 3 TDs; 11 carries, 152 yards, TD
Texas A&M N/A
TCU Denton Guyer 2017 QB Shawn Robinson: 11-19, 205 yards, 2 TDs; 9 rushes, 19 yards, TD
Baylor Mesquite Horn WR Jared Atkinson: 4 catches, 96 yards, TD
Texas Arlington Lamar QB Shane Buechele: 9-14, 104 yards, TD; 4 carries, 103 yards, TD
Oklahoma Mesquite Horn 2017 QB Chris Robison: 8-of-11, 110 yards, TD, INT; 4 rushes, 14 yards
SMU N/A
North Texas N/A
